member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IWalletActionActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information to an app that was launched as the result of a wallet action.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IWalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ActionId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the action, such as the id of the verb, transaction and so on.
member.returns: The ID of the action, such as the id of the verb, transaction and so on.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IWalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ActionKind
member.summary: Gets the action that was performed on the WalletItem.
member.returns: The action that was performed on the WalletItem.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.IWalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ItemId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the WalletItem on which the user performed the action.
member.returns: The ID of the WalletItem on which the user performed the action.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information to an app that was launched as the result of a wallet action.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ActionId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the action, such as the id of the verb, transaction and so on.
member.returns: The ID of the action, such as the id of the verb, transaction and so on.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ActionKind
member.summary: Gets the action that was performed on the WalletItem.
member.returns: Gets the action that was performed on the WalletItem.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.ItemId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the WalletItem on which the user performed the action.
member.returns: The ID of the WalletItem on which the user performed the action.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.Kind
member.summary: Gets the type of action that was performed on the WalletItem.
member.returns: The type of action that was performed on the WalletItem.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before it was activated.
member.returns: The execution state of the app before it was activated.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.WalletActionActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: Gets the splash screen object which provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
member.returns: The splash screen object which provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind
member.summary: Represents the action that was taken on the item that caused your app to launch.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind.Message
member.summary: A message was tapped.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind.MoreTransactions
member.summary: The UI item "see more transactions" was tapped.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind.OpenItem
member.summary: The item was opened.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind.Transaction
member.summary: A transaction was tapped.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Wallet.WalletActionKind.Verb
member.summary: A verb was tapped.
